Terms & Conditions.

† Excludes all small bottles, boxed wines, Wine Route wine, Case Deals, Kosher wines and Wine by the Case and all wine below £4 & 9% ABV. Excludes Express stores and Scotland. Offer ends 03/04/2016.

^ £1 delivery slots available when you spend £40 or more on orders placed on tesco.com/groceries or the Tesco Grocery Apps. Selected times only. Subject to availability. £5 Same day delivery trial running in a selected locations only. Subject to availability. Minimum basket charge applies to orders under £40.

* Once a day deliveries for every day included in your plan.

** Free next day Click+Collect when you spend £40 or more on orders placed on tesco.com/groceries or the Tesco Grocery Apps. Same day Click+Collect trial running in a select number of stores & £2 same day fee may apply. Contact Customer Services for further information. Minimum basket charge applies to orders under £40. Collection at selected UK stores. The free Click+Collect offer may be withdrawn without notice.
